response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $8,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an attractive price of $7,200. This is a special opportunity to save $800 on the original value, making it an excellent investment for you. I believe this product will significantly enhance your experience and contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
